name: New Rally-X 64
description:
Commodore 64 conversion of New Rally-X.

There are 2 versions:

1. Standard version runs on a plain C64 PAL or NTSC machine, this version runs a bit slower than the arcade version, but otherwise fully featured. 

2. REU  version requires a Ram Expansion Unit (REU) size 128k+, this version runs at full arcade speed.

Both versions are work in progress, the REU version is only a proof of concept to test out the fast scrolling using REU DMA.

Development thread on Lemon64: https://www.lemon64.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=77960
